Clean data

```{r}
#copy paste
rhc_clean <- rhc_data |> 
  bind_cols() |> 
  as_tibble() 

# convert death sting to binary: 1 = dead 0 = alive
rhc_clean |> mutate(death = case_when(
  death == "No" ~ 0,
  death == "Yes" ~ 1))

```
